---
title: Cranial Nerve Overview
---

Function:
- Ventral = Motor
- Dorsal = Sensory

Anatomy:

- Telencephalon: [Olfactory CN I]({{< var ref-cn1.path >}})
- Diencephalon: CN II
- Midbrain:
    - CN III (from interpeduncular fossa)
    - CN IV (from posterior aspect from brainstem inferior to Inferior colliculus)
    - Pons: CNV from Basilar Pons
- Pontomedullary junction:
    - CN VI: Medial
    - CN VII: Lateral
    - CN VIII: Lateral
- Medulla:
    - CNIX Rostral medulla
    - CNX: Posterior to Olive
    - CNXII: Anterior to Olive
- Upper cervical levels of spinal cord:
    - CN IX
